Name: Velvet Roof
Ingredients: 15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain back into shaker.
Review: Rich berry notes and subtle ginger compliment cognac freshened with lemon and dry aperitif.
History: Created by Adam Murphy at Tavern 219, Palatine, IL, USA
Nutrition: One serving of Velvet Roof contains 301 calories
